start.text: You stand in your great grandfather's house...

room1.text: You're in the library, the first room, and there are books covered with dust...

room2.text: You made it to the next room, a cavernous room with a chest in the center...
options: Investigate the papers on the table

room3.text: You're now in the bathroom, the third room, and it has NOT been cleaned for a while...
options: Read the vintage porno magazine hidden in the cabinet

room4.text: After a good read you find yourself in a giant hallway, with stairs to the second floor. Should i
options: Eat an old pizza crust from the floor
Examine the paintings on the wall
Sprint to the stairs before the ghost eats your kidneys
Smoke some of the sweet dank great grandpa left under a floorboard

room5.text: You are now on the second floor. It smells of death, but also chicken...
options: Find the source of the chicken smell
Try to remember why you are here
What is life anyway? You contemplate and time flies

room6.text: You are now in the bedroom. You now know where the smell come from. Apparently he had a chicken farm
in his bedroom? All of them are dead, except one. It seems demonic and you try to communicate with it...
options: Kill the demon chicken! Maybe i will get his powers?

room7.text: You feel stronger after killing the demon chicken but eating it raw was probably not the best choice...
options: Climb the ladder to the attic
Bring the papers you found to read later. They're written in a strange language, almost alien...

room8.text: You are now in the attic and the asbestos is everywhere. Luckily you ate the chicken and is unharmed.
Maybe i should eat more raw demon chicken? Or was it the last one in existance? Now one knows, for now...
options: Use the strange translation device you find in the corner of the room
Eat all the asbestos just because you can
Go through some boxes. It says 'classified' on them and 'Area 51 property...'
Jump out of the window because you are scared

room9.text: You use the translation device and the language is in face alien. From a species of alien living in
Area 51 that has inhabited the earth for centuries. They come from the Andromeda Galaxy and they
teach humans how to advance in technology. But the weirdest part is that your name is mentioned
several times. Almost like are of some importance you don't understand yet. You hear a load bang
outside and you think 'This is it'
options: Defend yourself against whatever comes at you
Say a silent prayer and accept your fate
Go and check what is the cause of the bang
Is it the dank from before that is playing with my mind?

room10.text: You are outside and you see a bright light. it fills you with warmth. You see 5 large figures, pale
in skin tone and a large frame. They speak but you don't understand...
options: Use the translation device. Maybe it can translate speech as well
Stand there paralyzed. like an idiot, and just stare
Scream at the top of your lungs, thinking it will scare them for some reason

room11.text: 'We are the Annunaki. We come in peace. You have a curious mind, just like your great grandfather.
If you are ready, we have the truth you have been looking for your whole life. Are you ready
options: How do they know my name? You faint again
Try to run for your life, but your feet can't move

room12.text: 'We can only tell you the truth if you are really prepared to hear it. You might think you are but
in reality you might not be. You can ask us questions first, but only ask us questions you are
ready to accept the truth. We are not responsible for what your mind is capable of comprehending...'
options: Who was my great grandfather, really?
Do you have a recepie for space pizza?
Thinking for yourself, 'The truth really was out there the whole time'
Take your gun and end it. 'This is to much, i can't handle it'

room13.text: 'You are asking a great question. Your great grandfather was actually a descendant from us. Do you
understand what that means to you?'
options: I don't even know you are real. I smoked a fat one before
I understand that i am scared
Do you have any space weed?
How can he be an alien and I am human?

room14.text: What says that you are human? You have always felt out of place, been much taller and stronger than
your peers. You have had almost an obsession with space your whole life. You have been drawn to the
Annunaki lore and 'myths' since you went to middle school. I'm surprised you have not been able to
connect the dots yet. But then again, your whole family kept it a secret from you your whole life.
Only your great grandfather, Ninhursag, who you called Jeff thought you had the right to know. And
for that we are grateful and that is also why we are here now. You have to make a choice. A choice
options: Hold on, what? I'm an alien?
Why did my family thought this was something to hide?
What is the choice i have to make?
'I can't believe this. An alien? What else have they been keeping from me?
You start crying, don't know what to feel. Is it happiness? Sadness? Both? Neither?

room15.text: You have to choose if you want to come with us to our home planet, Planet X that you have been told
is a wild conspiracy. We have wanted to keep it that way so the rest of earths population can live
in peace. They would not be able to handle a truth like that. The planet is a part of our solar system
but its trajectory is a very wide oval and it only passes close to earth every 15000 years. Now is
the time that Planet X is close to earth but it will only stay close for 3 more days and then the
window closes. Do you want to join us and explore the universe, or do you wish to live a human life,
devoid of all you have ever dreamt of.
options: Holy shit, are you guys serious?
'But if i leave, i have to leave my family behind. I am not ready to do that'
You are awestruck since everything you have read about this subject is TRUE. You stand
Please tell me more. I want to join, but i also have family here. I can't just leave them

room16.text: Your whole family, as we said before, are the same species as us. It was them who alerted us that you
were going to investigate Jeffs house. And we knew you would find the truth. If you choose to leave
earth behind, your family will follow.
options: This is all i have dreamt of, and my family will join me. Of course i will join you
I'm still a little sceptic. I need a breather since i feel a panic attack is coming
Stand in silence. How can you trust them? You have only spoken to them for about
I feel they are being sincere, and who would make such an elaborate prank? I will join them
No way, Jos√©. 'I'd rather die than to follow you liars. I have heard about aliens
and the butt stuff. I'm not into that.'

room17.text: You have made the right choice. Please join us to the ship and will leave for Planet X, also
known as Nibiru. You will finally come home.
options: I march straight to the ship
Well this is not what expected when i woke up this morning
This is to good to be true. Am i still tripping?
You pinch yourself in the arm, thinking it's all a dream but it is not. I join my
brothers in a voyage to explore the cosmos
I just need to go back an get a, uuuh, important magazine

room18.text: You are in the spaceship now. It's so much bigger on the inside than you could have imagined from
when you saw it from the outside. But i don't complain. This is me. This is my destiny
options: You feel a feeling you have never felt before. Is this real joy?
You explore the ship and push some buttons
So, where are we going after we have been to Nibiru?
You eat something you find on the floor, again. And now you have alien food poisoning
Read the vintage porno magazine, again. This is the only pictures you have of humans
that you will carry with you around the universe. You keep it so you never forget what
other humans than your family looks like. Even if it is a bit explicit

room19.text: My great grandfather comes to visit me. He says: 'This was the only way i could get you to
investigate. I did not have the courage to tell you myself; i did not want you to believe
i was crazy so i faked my death so you could find the truth by yourself. I hope you can forgive me.
The rest of my family gathers as well and life feels good. It feels right for the first time in
my life. It's all come together. I feel joy. I feel happiness. I am home.'
options: I throw up because of the alien food poisoning
I wonder what's next. I feel like this is only the beginning of mu journey
We land on Nibiru and in all my excitement i run out without any protective gear and
and i die immediately. My body was still programmed to be on earth and they hadn't
Take a big inhale of the space weed. Life is good

room19: You have found the truth...or have you?
